title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When choosing the SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText, a beep sound is heard.
EB: I expect that no beep sound should be heard when choosing the SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch ControlExampleText.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe that a beep sound is heard.
